item.title: News
item.description: 2020 28-Apr Preprint of our new paper LNMap released in Arxiv. 24-Apr Preprint of our new paper MultiMix released in Arxiv. 25-Mar Gave a talk on mBART (paper ) in NTU-NLP. 13-Feb Presenting our Cross-lingual-NER paper on AAAI-2020. 14-Dec Got AAAI-2020 travel scholarship. See you in New York. 11-Nov A paper accepted on AAAI 2020.

item.title: Academic: the website designer for Hugo
item.description: Create a beautifully simple website or blog in under 10 minutes.
